trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkobling streng verktøy.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>, and so on) derive.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DbConnectionStringBuilder gir basisklassen som string forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkoblingen verktøy (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>og så videre) avledet.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstreng verktøy gi utviklerne programmatisk opprette syntaktisk riktig tilkoblingsstrenger, og analysere og Bygg eksisterende tilkoblingsstrenger.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder has been defined in a database-agnostic manner.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder er definert i en database likegyldig måte.

trans-unit.source: Because of the addition of the <xref:System.Data.Common> namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av tillegg av den <xref:System.Data.Common>navneområdet, utviklere krever en basisklasse som de kan programmer for å bygge tilkoblingsstrenger kan arbeide mot en tilfeldig database.</xref:System.Data.Common>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the DbConnectionStringBuilder class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider.
trans-unit.target: Derfor kan klassen DbConnectionStringBuilder brukere tilordne tilfeldig nøkkel/verdi-par og sende Resultatstrengen tilkobling til en forespørselsparameter av sterk type leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Alle dataleverandørene som er inkludert som en del av .NET Framework gir en forespørselsparameter av sterk type klassen som arver fra DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>, og <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider.
trans-unit.target: Utvikleren kan bygge tilordne og Rediger tilkoblingsstrenger for en tilfeldig leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs.
trans-unit.target: For leverandører som støtter bestemte nøkkel/verdi-par, inneholder tilkoblingsstreng builder forespørselsparameter av sterk type egenskaper tilsvarer kjente-par.

trans-unit.source: In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan også angi tilfeldig nøkkel/verdi-par for å støtte leverandører som krever muligheten til å støtte ukjent verdier.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder klassen implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at klassen fungerer med Visual Studio utviklere under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: Når utviklere bruker designer for å bygge forespørselsparameter av sterk type datasett og forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkoblinger i Visual Studio, forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkoblingsstreng builder klassen viser egenskaper som er tilknyttet filtypen, og må også konverteringsprogrammer som kan tilordnes vanlige verdier for kjente nøkler.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere behov for å opprette tilkoblingsstrenger som en del av programmer kan bruke DbConnectionStringBuilder-klasse eller en av de forespørselsparameter av sterk type verdier du bygger og endre tilkoblingsstrengene.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DbConnectionStringBuilder gjør det også enkelt administrere tilkoblingsstrenger, er lagret i en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan opprette tilkoblingsstrenger ved hjelp av enten en forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkoblingsstreng builder klasse, eller de kan bruke DbConnectionStringBuilder-klassen.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder performs no checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: DbConnectionStringBuilder utfører ingen kontroller gyldig nøkkel/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Derfor er det mulig å bruke denne klassen til å opprette tilkoblingsstrenger, er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>støtter bare nøkkel/verdi-parene som støttes av SQL Server; prøver å legge til ugyldig par vil Iverksett et unntak.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A> method and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handle tries to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: Både den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>metoden og <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>egenskapen referansen prøver å sette inn skadelig oppføringer.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende kode escapes nestede nøkkel/verdi-paret riktig: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` resultatet er følgende tilkoblingsstrengen som behandler den ugyldige verdien på en sikker måte:``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> klasse eventuelt ved hjelp av ODBC-regler for sitere verdier.

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `useOdbcRules` er `true`, denne <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>bruker ODBC regler for sitere verdier (rundt verdier med klammeparenteser ({})).</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `useOdbcRules` er `false`, denne <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>bruker anførselstegn tegn ("") til å avgrense verdier.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>du bruker {} til å avgrense feltene. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å bruke anførselstegn.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en oppføring med den angitte nøkkelen og verdien til den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>kan også brukes til å legge til nye elementer ved å angi verdien for en nøkkel som ikke finnes i ordlisten.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Add method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller Add-metode ved å sende en null-verdi (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) nøkkelen oppstår en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: However, calling the Add method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Kaller Add-metode ved å sende en nullverdi fjerner imidlertid nøkkel/verdi-paret.

trans-unit.source: The key to add to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for å legge til den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyworder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Er en effektiv og sikker måte å tilføye en nøkkel og verdi i en eksisterende <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjør det mulig for utviklere å bruke en <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>til å opprette en samling av nøkkel/verdi-par skal kunne dra nytte av funksjonene som finnes i den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>klasse når du legger til nøkkel/verdi-par, uten å måtte utgiftene ved å opprette og behandle en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Den `AppendKeyValuePair` metoden formaterer nøkkel og verdi på riktig måte og legger til den nye strengen i den angitte <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>du vil legge til nøkkel/verdi-paret.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Er en effektiv og sikker måte å tilføye en nøkkel og verdi i en eksisterende <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjør det mulig for utviklere å bruke en <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>til å opprette en samling av nøkkel/verdi-par skal kunne dra nytte av funksjonene som finnes i den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>klasse når du legger til nøkkel/verdi-par, uten å måtte utgiftene ved å opprette og behandle en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Den `AppendKeyValuePair` metoden formaterer nøkkel og verdi på riktig måte og legger til den nye strengen i den angitte <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}).
trans-unit.target: Selv om de fleste datakilder lar deg avgrense felt ved hjelp av anførselstegn, ODBC ikke--for ODBC-tilkoblingsstrenger, må du bruke klammeparenteser ({}).

trans-unit.source: In order to have the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å få den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>Bruk ODBC regler for som avgrenser felt må du angi den `useOdbcRules` parameter `true`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>du vil legge til nøkkel/verdi-paret.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>du bruker {} til å avgrense felt, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å bruke anførselstegn.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property is visible in Visual Studio designers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>egenskapen er synlig i Visual Studio utviklere.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Developers creating designers that take advantage of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere oppretter utviklere som drar nytte av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>klassen må kunne tilkoblingsstrengen synlig eller usynlig i den utformeren Egenskapsrutenett.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The BrowsableConnectionString property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BrowsableConnectionString kan indikere at egenskapen skal være usynlig ved å sette egenskapen til utviklere `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection string is visible within designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingsstrengen er synlig i utviklere; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ellers.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner innholdet på den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: Fjern for fjerner alle nøkkel/verdi-par fra den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>og tilbakestiller alle tilhørende egenskaper.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter oppsett av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>egenskapen settes til 0 og <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>egenskapen til en tom streng.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects on the associated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner samlingen av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> objekter i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by designers to clear all associated property descriptors on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes av utviklere for å fjerne alle tilknyttede egenskapen beskrivelser <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilkoblingsstrengen som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer en semikolondelt liste over nøkkel/verdi-par lagres i samlingen vedlikeholdes av <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign.
trans-unit.target: Hvert par inneholder nøkkel og verdi, atskilt med et likhetstegn.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: Følgende eksempel illustrerer en vanlig tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property.
trans-unit.target: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ```Dataleverandørene kan forvente bestemte nøkler og verdier for hver egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: , These values are documented individually.
trans-unit.target: , Disse verdiene er dokumentert enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>klassen kan ikke valideres nøkkel/verdi-parene som er forbundet med tilkoblingsstrengen, selv om klasser som arver fra det can.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionString-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>klassen fungerer vanligvis som en mekanisme for oppretting og analyse semikolondelt lister over nøkkel/verdi-par atskilt med et likhetstegn.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Det gir ingen valideringsfeil eller annen støtte som er spesifikke for tilkoblingsstrenger.

trans-unit.source: If you add items to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> collection, the ConnectionString property will reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du legger til elementer for den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>samling, ConnectionString-egenskapen, gjenspeiler endringene.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to the ConnectionString property, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tilordner en verdi til ConnectionString-egenskapen i <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>vil prøve å analysere verdien, med semikolon og likhetstegn skilletegnene.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende tilkoblingsstreng, opprettet fra nøkkel/verdi-parene som finnes i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: En ugyldig tilkobling strengargument er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> inneholder en bestemt nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for å finne i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of keys that are contained within the connection string maintained by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Antall nøkler som finnes i tilkoblingsstrengen vedlikeholdes av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Compares the connection information in this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object with the connection information in the supplied object.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner informasjonen i dette <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objekt med tilkoblingsinformasjonen i det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligninger på Nøkkelnavn er bokstaver; verdien sammenligninger er bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: The EquivalentTo method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EquivalentTo returnerer `true` Hvis nøkkel/verdi-parene er like, uavhengig av rekkefølgen.

trans-unit.source: The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen virkemåten til to tilkoblingsstrengene er like, fordi rekkefølgen er aldri viktig i tilkoblingsstrengene.

trans-unit.source: However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen kan imidlertid påvirke virkemåten for tilkoblinger som er basert på disse tilkoblingsstrenger for tilkoblingsgruppering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> to be compared with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> som skal sammenlignes med dette <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection information in both of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> objects causes an equivalent connection string; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingsinformasjonen i begge den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objekter forårsaker en tilsvarende tilkoblingsstreng; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Fills a supplied <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> with information about all the properties of this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller en angitte <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> med informasjon om alle egenskapene for denne <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref> fylles med informasjon om denne <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements.
trans-unit.target: En samling med fast størrelse tillater ikke legge til eller fjerne elementer etter at samlingen er opprettet, men de kan endre eksisterende elementer.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: En samling med fast størrelse er bare en samling med en tekstbryting som hindrer legge til og fjerne elementer. Hvis du endrer til den underliggende samlingen, inkludert å legge til eller fjerne elementer, gjenspeiler samlingen fast størrelse endringene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> har en fast størrelse; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet samling tillater ikke legge til, fjerne eller endre elementer etter at samlingen er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: En skrivebeskyttet samling er en samling med en tekstbryting som hindrer endring av samlingen. Hvis du endrer underliggende samlingen, gjenspeiler skrivebeskyttet samling endringene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som er forbundet med den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, hvis den angitte nøkkelen finnes allerede i ordlisten, erstattes verdien; Hvis ikke, opprettes et nytt element.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for element for å hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er knyttet til den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: If the specified key is not found, trying to get it returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), and trying to set it creates a new element using the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte nøkkelen ikke finnes, forsøk på å hente den returnerer en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic), og forsøk på å angi den oppretter et nytt element med den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Passing a null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Sende en null-verdi (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) nøkkelen oppstår en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: Assigning a null value removes the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne en nullverdi fjerner nøkkel/verdi-paret.

trans-unit.target: keyworder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er angitt, og <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The property is set, keyword does not exist in the collection, and the has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - eller - egenskapen er angitt, keyword finnes ikke i samlingen og har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder nøklene i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke angitt, men det er den samme rekkefølgen som de tilhørende verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the keys in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke en statisk kopi; i stedet <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>refererer tilbake til nøklene i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor endres til <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>gjenspeiles i <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder nøklene i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner posten med den angitte nøkkelen fra den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Siden Remove-metoden returnerer en verdi som angir hvor vellykket, den ikke kreves for å se etter nøkkelen før du prøver å fjerne nøkkel/verdi-paret fra den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen fantes i tilkoblingsstrengen, ble fjernet; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis nøkkelen ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som tilsvarer den angitte nøkkelen fra dette <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to first call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TryGetValue kan utviklere trygt å hente en verdi fra en <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>uten å måtte først kalle den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Fordi TryGetValue ikke utløse et unntak når du kaller det i en ikke-eksisterende nøkkel, har du ikke å søke etter en nøkkel før henting av verdien.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kaller TryGetValue med en ikke-eksisterende nøkkel setter null-verdi (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) i den `value` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for elementet som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to the `key`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som svarer til de `key`.

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Hvis keyword ble funnet i tilkoblingsstrengen, ellers.

trans-unit.source: keyword contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordinneholder en nullverdi ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder verdiene i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke angitt, men det er den samme rekkefølgen som de tilknyttede nøklene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the values in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke en statisk kopi; i stedet <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>refererer tilbake til verdiene i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor endres til <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>gjenspeiles i <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder verdiene i den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
